title: The International Bad Boys Hour Ep 52: Good Times with Steve Simeone
description: Steve Simeone joins the Bad Boys live in studio for another instant classic.  The boys talk about The Comedy Store, bad ass special forces and finding happiness what ever you do.  This episode is easily one of our best yet.  I hope you enjoy this episode and thank you for your support.  Please let us know what you think of the episode and what you like and dislike about the show show!
